title: Urgent Shift: Vitalik Buterin Champions Open Source Funding Over Public Goods
body: The crypto world is buzzing with a fresh perspective from one of its most influential voices. Vitalik Buterin, the co-founder of Ethereum, has recently sparked a crucial conversation, urging the community to rethink its approach to funding projects. Instead of primarily focusing on ‘public goods,’ Buterin is advocating for a strategic pivot towards open source funding . Let’s dive into why this shift is considered so vital and what it means for the future of blockchain innovation. What’s the Real Deal with Public Goods in Crypto? In a recent blog post that has ignited discussions across the crypto sphere, Vitalik Buterin articulated his thoughts on the effectiveness of funding models within decentralized ecosystems. He pointed out that while the concept of ‘public goods’ is noble and aims to support projects benefiting a large number of people, it often falls short in practice. Think about it: projects like open source software, essential blockchain research, and freely accessible educational resources are undeniably valuable. They are the backbone of a thriving decentralized world. But, are they getting the funding they truly deserve under the current ‘public goods’ umbrella? Buterin raises a critical point: the term ‘public goods’ itself is often misinterpreted, leading to misdirected funding and unintended consequences. Here’s a breakdown of the challenges he highlights: Misinterpretation and Misapplication: The term ‘public goods’ can be easily misunderstood. People might associate it solely with government-led initiatives, which is not always the case in the decentralized crypto space. Funding Based on Appeal, Not Impact: Often, projects that are visually appealing or have a strong marketing narrative tend to attract funding, regardless of their actual long-term value or contribution to the ecosystem. This can lead to resources being allocated inefficiently. Commercial Projects Masquerading as Public Goods: The lines become blurred when commercial projects, especially those launching their own tokens, claim to be public goods. While commercial ventures are not inherently bad, this practice can obscure the true nature of public goods and make it harder to distinguish between genuinely altruistic projects and those with profit motives. Why Open Source Funding Takes Center Stage? So, if ‘public goods’ funding has its pitfalls, what’s the alternative? Buterin champions a sharper focus on open source funding . His reasoning is quite compelling. He argues that the very nature of open source inherently aligns with the core principles of a public good – providing widespread benefits and fostering collaborative development. Let’s explore why open source funding is emerging as a potentially more effective strategy: Intrinsic Public Benefit: Open source projects, by definition, make their code and resources freely available to everyone. This inherently creates a public good, as anyone can use, modify, and build upon this foundation. Transparency and Collaboration: Open source fosters transparency and encourages community collaboration. This open nature can lead to more robust, secure, and innovative projects, as they benefit from the collective intelligence of a wider developer community. Clearer Funding Focus: Focusing on open source funding provides a more defined and actionable approach. It allows funders to directly support the development and maintenance of the fundamental infrastructure that underpins the entire crypto ecosystem. Reduced Ambiguity: Unlike the broader term ‘public goods,’ open source is a more concrete and well-understood concept, reducing the scope for misinterpretation and misapplication of funds. Benefits of Prioritizing Open Source Funding Shifting the focus towards open source funding in the crypto space could unlock a range of significant benefits. Imagine a future where the foundational layers of blockchain technology are robustly funded and continuously improved by a global community. Here’s what we could gain: Accelerated Innovation: Consistent open source funding can fuel faster innovation cycles. Developers are incentivized to contribute, leading to quicker advancements in core technologies. Enhanced Security and Reliability: With more resources dedicated to open source projects, we can expect stronger security audits, bug fixes, and overall more reliable infrastructure. This is crucial for building trust and stability in the crypto ecosystem. Empowered Developer Community: Open source funding directly supports developers, the lifeblood of crypto innovation. It can attract and retain talent, fostering a vibrant and thriving community of builders. Sustainable Ecosystem Growth: By investing in the foundational open source infrastructure, we pave the way for more sustainable and organic growth of the entire crypto ecosystem. Navigating the Challenges of Public Goods Funding While the intention behind public goods funding is commendable, it’s crucial to acknowledge the challenges that Buterin highlights. Ignoring these pitfalls could lead to inefficiencies and hinder the long-term progress of the decentralized web. Let’s delve deeper into the problems: Challenge Description Impact on Crypto Funding Ambiguity of ‘Public Goods’ The term lacks a clear, universally accepted definition in the crypto context, leading to varied interpretations. Makes it difficult to define which projects truly qualify for ‘public goods’ funding, leading to subjective decisions. Funding based on ‘Appeal’ Projects with strong marketing or visual appeal may attract more funding, regardless of their fundamental value. Resources may be diverted from essential but less ‘glamorous’ projects like core protocol development or security audits. Commercial Projects’ Claims Commercial entities launching tokens sometimes label themselves as ‘public goods,’ blurring the lines. Distorts the purpose of public goods funding, potentially benefiting for-profit ventures under the guise of public service. Measurement Difficulty Quantifying the ‘public good’ impact of a project can be complex and subjective. Makes it challenging to objectively evaluate the effectiveness of public goods funding and allocate resources based on impact. Examples: Open Source vs. Public Goods in Action To solidify the distinction, let’s consider some practical examples in the crypto landscape: Open Source Examples: Ethereum Protocol Development: The core Ethereum protocol itself is open source . Funding initiatives that support core developers working on protocol upgrades and maintenance directly contribute to open source funding . Solidity Compiler: The Solidity compiler, essential for Ethereum smart contract development, is an open source tool. Funding its development and improvement falls under open source funding . Web3.js and Ethers.js Libraries: These popular JavaScript libraries, used to interact with the Ethereum blockchain, are open source . Supporting their development is a prime example of open source funding . Public Goods (Broader Interpretation) Examples: Educational Platforms: Free online courses and educational resources about blockchain technology can be considered public goods , but their open source nature might vary. Community Forums and Social Platforms: Online forums and platforms that facilitate crypto community discussions could be seen as public goods , but might not always be directly tied to open source code development. Decentralized Identity Solutions: Projects aiming to create universal decentralized identity systems could be classified as public goods , but the focus on open source implementation and funding might be less direct. Actionable Insights: Moving Towards Effective Funding Buterin’s call to action is not just theoretical; it’s a practical guide for the crypto community to refine its funding strategies. Here are some actionable insights we can glean: Prioritize Open Source Projects: Actively seek out and support projects that are genuinely open source and contribute to the foundational infrastructure of the crypto ecosystem. Focus on Measurable Impact: When evaluating funding proposals, prioritize projects with clear, measurable impacts on the open source ecosystem, rather than solely relying on subjective ‘public good’ assessments. Encourage Transparency and Accountability: Promote transparency in funding allocation and hold open source projects accountable for delivering on their promises and utilizing funds effectively. Educate and Raise Awareness: Foster a deeper understanding within the crypto community about the nuances of public goods versus open source funding and the importance of strategically allocating resources. Conclusion: A Smarter Path Forward for Crypto Funding Vitalik Buterin’s perspective offers a valuable course correction for crypto funding. By advocating for a sharper focus on open source funding , he highlights a pathway towards more effective, sustainable, and impactful resource allocation. The crypto space thrives on open collaboration and decentralized innovation. By strategically channeling funding towards the open source projects that underpin this ecosystem, we can unlock even greater potential and build a truly robust and beneficial decentralized future. It’s time to heed Buterin’s call and champion the power of open source as the bedrock of crypto progress. To learn more about the latest crypto funding trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum ecosystem growth.

title: Hope for XRP as BRICS Considers New Cross-Border Payment System
body: A recent tweet from crypto influencer Amelie has drawn attention to ongoing developments within BRICS regarding a new cross-border payment system. Amelie’s post highlighted that BRICS countries have previously tested XRP and suggested it could soon become the global standard for international transactions. Her tweet linked to an article that reported statements from Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov, who confirmed that Moscow is working on financial instruments within BRICS, including a cross-border payment system. BREAKING: BRICS CONSIDERS NEW CROSS-BORDER PAYMENT SYSTEM! BRICS COUNTRIES HAVE SUCCESSFULLY TESTED #XRP IN THE PAST! THAT‘S IT FOLKS, XRP WILL BE THE GLOBAL STANDARD SOON! https://t.co/ZBnYLZ0wTz pic.twitter.com/xp1bwza4kW — 𝓐𝓶𝓮𝓵𝓲𝓮 (@_Crypto_Barbie) March 27, 2025 BRICS Exploring a New Financial Infrastructure According to the article shared in Amelie’s tweet, Siluanov stated that BRICS is evaluating financial innovations, particularly a cross-border payment system that could integrate national currencies, digital technologies, and digital financial assets. He emphasized that Moscow is closely monitoring advancements in financial infrastructure, noting that such developments are essential for strengthening trade and economic growth among BRICS nations. One of the key reasons BRICS is pushing for alternative payment systems is the impact of Western sanctions, particularly the exclusion of Russian banks from SWIFT. In response to these restrictions, BRICS countries have been accelerating efforts to establish independent financial networks that reduce reliance on Western-dominated systems . We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 XRP’s Role in Previous BRICS Testing Amelie’s tweet referenced past tests of XRP by BRICS countries, though no specific details were provided in the linked article regarding its inclusion in current plans. XRP has been used in various pilot programs for cross-border payments due to its speed and efficiency. making it a potential option for countries looking to move away from traditional systems. The idea that XRP could play a role in BRICS’s financial strategy aligns with the broader trend of exploring blockchain-based solutions for international payments. However, no official confirmation from BRICS leaders regarding XRP in the proposed system. Potential Implications for Global Finance If BRICS implements a new cross-border payment system, it could significantly impact global finance by reducing reliance on existing Western-controlled networks. The inclusion of digital financial assets in BRICS discussions suggests that blockchain technology could play a role in their strategy. However, details on which assets or networks will be used remain unclear. Siluanov also provided an update on Russia’s budget deficit, stating that it is expected to decline to 0.5% of the GDP this year from 1.7% in 2024. This financial outlook indicates Russia’s focus on economic stability amid broader financial restructuring within BRICS. title: Astonishing Trump Pardon: BitMEX Co-founders Freed from AML Charges in Shocking Crypto Move
body: In an astonishing turn of events that has sent ripples through the cryptocurrency world, former U.S. President Donald Trump has issued pardons to BitMEX exchange co-founders Arthur Hayes, Benjamin Delo, and Samuel Reed. This move, reported by CNBC, effectively wipes the slate clean for the trio who had previously admitted guilt in violating the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) and agreed to hefty $10 million penalties each in 2022. This development arrives after the exchange itself already paid a staggering $100 million fine for serious anti-money laundering (AML) failures. What does this unexpected pardon mean for the future of cryptocurrency regulation and the industry as a whole? Let’s dive deep into this developing story. Trump Pardon: A Shockwave for Cryptocurrency Regulation The news of the Trump pardon has undoubtedly sparked widespread debate and speculation within the crypto community and beyond. The timing and implications of this presidential action raise several critical questions. Was this a politically motivated decision? What signal does it send regarding the U.S. stance on cryptocurrency regulation and enforcement, particularly concerning AML violations? Here’s a breakdown of the key aspects: Unexpected Relief: The pardon offers complete relief from the legal consequences for Arthur Hayes, Benjamin Delo, and Samuel Reed. They are no longer under the shadow of their past guilty pleas and financial penalties related to AML violations . Broader Implications for Crypto Regulation: This move could be interpreted in various ways. Some might see it as a softening stance on crypto regulation, while others might view it as an isolated act of presidential clemency. The long-term impact on how regulators approach cryptocurrency regulation remains to be seen. Industry Reaction: The crypto industry is likely to have a mixed reaction. While some may see this as a positive sign of reduced government overreach, others might worry that it undermines the importance of compliance and AML violations prevention within the crypto space. Who are the BitMEX Co-founders and What Were the AML Violations? To fully grasp the significance of the Trump pardon , it’s crucial to understand who Arthur Hayes, Benjamin Delo, and Samuel Reed are, and the nature of the charges against them. BitMEX, or Bitcoin Mercantile Exchange, was once a dominant force in the cryptocurrency derivatives market. Here’s a closer look at the individuals and their offenses: Co-founder Role at BitMEX Charge Penalty (Pre-Pardon) Arthur Hayes CEO Violating Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) $10 million fine Benjamin Delo CTO Violating Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) $10 million fine Samuel Reed CFO Violating Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) $10 million fine The AML violations stemmed from BitMEX’s failure to implement and maintain an adequate anti-money laundering program. U.S. authorities argued that BitMEX deliberately skirted U.S. regulations, allowing the platform to be used for illicit activities. The Bank Secrecy Act requires financial institutions to have robust AML programs to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing. BitMEX’s shortcomings in this area led to both individual charges against the co-founders and a substantial fine for the exchange itself. Arthur Hayes and the Future After the Pardon Arthur Hayes , as the former CEO and public face of BitMEX, is perhaps the most prominent figure among the pardoned co-founders. His journey from leading a crypto giant to facing criminal charges has been closely watched. Now, with the Trump pardon , what does the future hold for Hayes and his colleagues? Re-entry into the Crypto Space?: The pardon potentially clears the path for Hayes, Delo, and Reed to re-engage more actively in the cryptocurrency industry. Whether they choose to launch new ventures or take on advisory roles remains to be seen. Reputational Impact: While the pardon removes the legal burden, the reputational stain of the AML violations might linger. However, in the often-forgiving world of crypto, a comeback is certainly possible. Lessons Learned for Crypto Exchanges: The BitMEX case, even with the pardon, serves as a crucial reminder to all cryptocurrency exchanges about the paramount importance of robust AML compliance . Ignoring regulatory requirements can lead to severe legal and financial repercussions. The Broader Context of Cryptocurrency Regulation The Trump pardon occurs at a time when cryptocurrency regulation is a hot topic globally. Governments worldwide are grappling with how to oversee this rapidly evolving asset class. The BitMEX case and subsequent pardon highlight the complexities and challenges in this regulatory landscape. Here are some key takeaways in the context of cryptocurrency regulation : Regulatory Uncertainty: The crypto industry still faces significant regulatory uncertainty in many jurisdictions. The lack of clear and consistent rules can hinder innovation and growth. AML Compliance is Non-Negotiable: Regardless of individual pardons, the message from regulators is clear: AML compliance is not optional for cryptocurrency businesses. Robust KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML procedures are essential for operating legally. Global Coordination Needed: Given the borderless nature of cryptocurrencies, international cooperation in cryptocurrency regulation is becoming increasingly vital to prevent regulatory arbitrage and ensure effective oversight. Actionable Insights and Looking Ahead What can we learn from this surprising Trump pardon and the BitMEX saga? For individuals and businesses in the crypto space, here are some actionable insights: Prioritize Compliance: For crypto businesses, investing in strong legal and compliance frameworks is not just about avoiding fines; it’s about building trust and ensuring long-term sustainability. Stay Informed on Regulatory Developments: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is constantly evolving. Staying updated on the latest rules and guidelines in your operating jurisdictions is crucial. Engage with Regulators: Proactive engagement with regulators can help shape sensible and effective regulations that foster innovation while mitigating risks. The Trump pardon of the BitMEX co-founders is a significant event in the cryptocurrency world, raising questions about the future of cryptocurrency regulation and enforcement. While it offers relief to the individuals involved, the underlying issues of AML compliance and regulatory clarity remain as critical as ever for the continued growth and maturity of the crypto industry. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: XRP Price Prediction: Analyst Eyes $5 Target Despite 5% Drop
body: The post XRP Price Prediction: Analyst Eyes $5 Target Despite 5% Drop appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP’s price has taken a hit recently, and it’s not just XRP—Ethereum, Dogecoin, and Bitcoin are all down too. Bitcoin is struggling to hold the $85,000 mark, which is a key support level. So, what’s causing this sell-off? A few key factors are at play. First, fresh tariffs announced by President Trump are causing market jitters, especially with new taxes on the auto industry. This uncertainty is making investors nervous, which affects both traditional markets and cryptocurrencies like XRP. Another reason is the fear of a potential recession, fueled by inflation data and economic reports. Even though the fear of a recession isn’t fully backed by facts, it’s still affecting investor confidence. Plus, there’s a lack of liquidity—meaning not enough money flowing into the markets, which makes prices more volatile. XRP Price: What Comes Next? XRP has been catching a lot of attention lately, with experts trying to figure out where its price might head next. Some think XRP could hit between $10 and $11, but that’s not set in stone. A big factor to watch is the potential approval of an XRP ETF, which could really shake things up. Crypto analyst Evan Aldo took a closer look at XRP’s chart and said it’s a bit unusual right now. He thinks XRP might hit around $5.83 soon, which is a key price level. However, he doesn’t expect it to break $6 this year, and reaching $10 might be a bit too ambitious. Aldo also pointed out that if XRP can go above $3.30, the next target could be around $5. It’s important to understand that XRP has a history of staying flat for a while before suddenly jumping, so things could change fast. At press time, XRP has dropped more than 5% and is trading at $2.14.

title: Analyst Benjamin Cowen Issues Urgent Bitcoin Alert, Says ‘Death Cross’ Now Looming Over BTC – Here’s His Outlook
body: Cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin Cowen is highlighting a technical signal that could trigger a massive leg down for Bitcoin ( BTC ). In a new strategy session, Cowen tells his 888,000 YouTube subscribers that Bitcoin could witness a death cross “in about one to two weeks” if the status quo remains. A death cross is a bearish signal that occurs when an asset’s 50-day moving average crosses below its 200-day moving average. According to Cowen, a sell-off could precede the death cross. “There’s plenty of times where there’s a sell-off just before the death cross, just before it… If it happens again, it could be kind of a scary time.” Source: Benjamin Cowen/YouTube Based on the trader’s chart, he seems to suggest that a looming death cross foreshadows a Bitcoin correction, as witnessed in 2019 and 2021. The widely followed analyst also unveils his outlook in the event that his bearish prediction takes place. “Usually there’s a low around the time of that death cross and depending on how low the price is at that time would sort of give us some insight into the fate of the next rally – whether it’s a rally to a new high or just a counter-trend rally to a lower high.” According to Cowen, a drop below $70,000 could mean that Bitcoin has broken the market structure and will not rise above the current all-time high of around $109,000. “…[BTC could] resolve to a lower high if Bitcoin goes into the $60,000s, especially the low $60,000s… …if it’s like $63,000, it’s going to be hard to ignore.” If Bitcoin carves a local bottom above $70,000, Cowen says, “If it holds above $73,000, then there’s no guarantee with the market, but it would suggest that the structure of the market remains intact.” Bitcoin is trading at $85,052 at time of writing. title: Urgent CFTC Action: Crypto Derivatives Regulation Under Scrutiny
body: In a surprising move that has sent ripples through the digital asset space, the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) has announced the withdrawal of two significant staff advisories concerning cryptocurrencies. Are you wondering what this sudden shift in crypto regulation means for the future of digital assets and derivatives trading? Let’s dive into the details and explore the potential implications of this pivotal decision. Why Did CFTC Withdraw Crypto Advisories? The CFTC’s decision centers around two specific advisories: Advisory (23-07): Focused on expanding Derivatives Clearing Organization (DCO) clearing for cryptocurrencies. Advisory (18-14): Dealt with the listing of crypto derivatives. According to the official statement on the CFTC website, the withdrawal is a strategic move to ensure that there’s no misinterpretation that crypto derivatives are treated differently from other financial products under their regulatory purview. In essence, the CFTC aims for a level playing field, applying consistent regulatory standards across all derivatives, regardless of the underlying asset. Decoding the Crypto Regulation Rationale The core reason behind this withdrawal boils down to uniformity in crypto regulation. The CFTC wants to avoid creating a perception of special treatment for the crypto market. By withdrawing these advisories, they are signaling that crypto derivatives will be evaluated and regulated under the same framework as traditional derivatives. This move could be interpreted in several ways: Clarity and Consistency: It aims to provide clarity that the existing regulatory framework for derivatives applies equally to crypto derivatives. No Preferential Treatment: It emphasizes that the CFTC isn’t creating a separate or potentially more lenient regime for crypto. Risk Management Focus: It underscores the CFTC’s commitment to managing risks associated with crypto derivatives within the broader financial system. Impact on Crypto Derivatives Market What does this mean for the bustling crypto derivatives market? Here’s a breakdown of potential impacts: Impact Area Potential Effect Market Perception May initially cause some uncertainty as market participants adjust to the removal of specific crypto-focused guidance. However, in the long run, it could foster confidence by demonstrating regulatory maturity. Compliance Entities dealing with crypto derivatives will need to ensure they comply with the general derivatives regulations, without relying on the withdrawn advisories for specific crypto interpretations. Innovation Could potentially streamline innovation by removing any ambiguity about differentiated regulatory pathways for crypto derivatives. Innovators can focus on adhering to established derivatives regulations. Institutional Adoption May encourage institutional investors by reinforcing the idea that crypto derivatives are being brought under a familiar and robust regulatory umbrella, similar to other asset classes. Challenges and Opportunities in Crypto Regulation While the CFTC’s move towards uniform crypto regulation is generally seen as a step towards maturity, it also presents challenges and opportunities: Challenge: Interpretation and Application – The existing derivatives regulations might not perfectly map to the unique characteristics of cryptocurrencies. Interpretation and application will be crucial and may require further clarification from the CFTC. Challenge: Industry Adaptation – Crypto firms accustomed to the withdrawn advisories may need to reassess their compliance strategies to align with the broader derivatives framework. Opportunity: Enhanced Legitimacy – Treating crypto derivatives within the established regulatory structure can significantly enhance the legitimacy of the crypto market in the eyes of traditional financial institutions and the public. Opportunity: Global Harmonization – This action could set a precedent for other global regulators to adopt a similar approach, fostering greater harmonization in international crypto regulation. Actionable Insights for Crypto Businesses For businesses operating in the crypto derivatives space, here are some actionable insights: Review Compliance Frameworks: Immediately reassess your compliance strategies in light of the withdrawn advisories. Ensure alignment with general derivatives regulations. Seek Legal Counsel: Engage with legal experts specializing in derivatives and crypto regulations to understand the nuances of this change. Engage with Regulators: Maintain open communication with the CFTC and participate in industry dialogues to contribute to the evolving regulatory landscape. Focus on Robust Risk Management: Strengthen your risk management practices to meet the rigorous standards expected under general derivatives regulation. Conclusion: A Step Towards Mainstream Crypto? The CFTC’s withdrawal of these crypto-specific advisories is a significant indicator of the evolving regulatory approach towards digital assets. By choosing to regulate cryptocurrency derivatives under the existing framework, the CFTC is signaling a move towards mainstreaming crypto within the traditional financial system. While questions and adjustments will undoubtedly arise, this action ultimately aims to foster a more consistent, transparent, and robust regulatory environment for the burgeoning crypto market. This decisive step could be a catalyst for greater institutional participation and broader acceptance of crypto as a legitimate asset class. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping crypto regulation and market trends.

title: Peter Brandt Predicts XRP Could Drop to $1.07 Unless It Hits $3
body: The post Peter Brandt Predicts XRP Could Drop to $1.07 Unless It Hits $3 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Peter Brandt, a veteran market analyst, has identified a pattern in XRP’s price chart called a head and shoulders top. This is a bearish pattern usually that signals an imminent downtrend. He suggests that the price will drop, potentially reaching its lowest point from November 2024, unless the coin makes a strong recovery. XRP Struggles for Direction Amid Bearish Trend Since March began, XRP hasn’t shown a clear upward or downward trend. The altcoin has experienced both price drops and occasional rises, but overall, it remains in a bearish trend. “This could become bullish if 3.0 is exceeded, otherwise the implications is a decline to 1.07,” he noted. Don't shoot the messenger. Your favorite Beanie Baby/Pet Rock crypto displays a classic complex H&S top. This could become bullish if 3.0 is exceeded, otherwise the implications is a decline to 1.07. If you have an issue with this, take it up with Magee and Edwards $XRP pic.twitter.com/nHaIgn8uP4 — Peter Brandt (@PeterLBrandt) March 28, 2025 Brandt’s chart shows that the left shoulder formed when XRP hit a $2.9 peak in early December 2024. This surge followed an uptrend that started in November 2024 after Donald Trump’s election win, with XRP rising from $0.5 in November to $2.9 in December before facing a price drop. After more than a month of sideways movement, XRP bounced back, reaching a new seven-year high of $3.4 in mid-January 2025. This peak marked the “head” of the pattern. However, after hitting resistance at $3.4, XRP dropped along with the broader market. Interestingly, following President Donald Trump’s announcement that XRP will be part of the U.S. crypto reserve, XRP rallied again, peaking at $3 on March 2, forming the “right shoulder.” Key Levels To Watch With both shoulders and the head in place, the pattern’s neckline is around $1.9 to $2. This level is crucial because it will decide whether the head and shoulders pattern holds or gets invalidated. In his latest analysis, Brandt called XRP a “pet rock,” echoing his previous negative opinions about the asset. However, he acknowledged that if XRP breaks above $3, the bearish outlook would no longer apply. If the head and shoulders pattern holds true, Brandt predicts XRP could drop to $1.07, a level last seen in November 2024. Falling below $2 and into the $1 range would be a bearish sign for XRP. Brandt previously warned that this drop could happen if XRP falls below $1.9, the key support level. Right now, XRP is trading at $2.16, down 6.12% in the last 24 hours. A further 12% drop could push it to test the $1.9 support. Previous analysts suggest that XRP stays bullish as long as it holds above $2. Economic Factors Besides, Beyond technical charts, economic factors also impact XRP’s price. The upcoming 25% tariffs on car imports, starting April 3 under Trump’s policy, could raise manufacturing costs and fuel inflation. Besides, the CME FedWatch Tool estimates the chances of a rate cut in June at 55.7%, down from 67.3% last week. If the Fed keeps rates higher for longer, it can decrease liquidity in speculative markets, which may negatively impact risk assets such as XRP.

title: John Deaton Urges SEC to Release Hinman Docs in Crypto Case: Will It Comply?
body: In a bold call for transparency, pro-XRP attorney John Deaton urges the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to provide clarity over Bill Hinman’s controversial speech. Deaton pushes the regulator to release the long-awaited Inspector General (IG) report on Hinman’s “Ether Speech.” John Deaton Urges SEC To Release Hinman Report In a recent X post, John Deaton urged the US SEC to bring transparency to the contentious Hinman speech. The lawyer pushes the regulator to fully disclose past wrongdoings, particularly regarding the SEC’s handling of former Director William Hinman’s 2018 “Ether Speech.” Significantly, John Deaton believes that the IG report should be made public to shed light on the SEC’s approach to crypto classification. He also believes that such a move could ensure transparency in regulatory actions. He argues that releasing the report is crucial to understanding whether regulatory decisions were made impartially. Thus, Deaton urges new SEC Chair Paul Atkins and key officials like Mark Udeya and Hester Peirce “to support making the report public.” John Deaton’s Call for Transparency Previously, in December, John Deaton underscored the necessity of releasing the IG report on the Hinman speech. The XRP lawyer wrote that the facts surrounding Willian Hinman’s 2018 Ether Speech suggest a potential conflict of interest. Reportedly, this violates the federal law 18 USC 208, which prohibits government officials from engaging in conflict-of-interest activities. Notably, John Deaton’s latest X post reinforces his previous statements. He emphasizes that the public has a right to know the investigation’s findings, regardless of the outcome. In a recent development, Deaton clarified the ambiguities surrounding the SEC’s explanations on the roles of XRP, SOL, and other altcoins within the US government. The SEC’s official page has released a document clarifying the altcoins’ roles. However, Deaton asserted that the SEC itself hasn’t been involved in it. Will SEC Bring Clarity To Crypto Regulations and Classifications? For context, John Deaton’s statement could be linked back to a controversial speech by William Hinman, the former Director of the SEC’s Division of Corporation Finance. In 2018, Hinman stated that Ethereum’s Ether token was not a security, which became a “free pass” for the token. Later, Empower Oversight flagged potential conflicts of interest due to William Hinman’s ties to Simpson Thacher & Bartlett. The SEC’s recent shift towards a progressive crypto stance has sparked speculation that they may heed Deaton’s call for transparency. Recently, the SEC has officially dropped lawsuits against multiple crypto firms, including Kraken, Cumberland, and Consensys. The post John Deaton Urges SEC to Release Hinman Docs in Crypto Case: Will It Comply? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Hopeful Signals: San Francisco Fed Hints at Two Interest Rate Cuts Igniting Crypto Market Optimism
body: Exciting news for crypto enthusiasts! San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly has indicated that two interest rate cuts are still on the table for 2025. This development, reported by Reuters, has sparked discussions across financial markets, including the ever-volatile cryptocurrency space. Could this be the signal crypto investors have been waiting for? Let’s dive into what this means for the future of digital assets. Decoding Interest Rate Cuts: What’s the Buzz About? Interest rate cuts are a powerful tool used by central banks like the Federal Reserve to manage the economy. But what exactly are they, and why should crypto investors care? Stimulating the Economy: Lowering interest rates makes borrowing cheaper for businesses and consumers. This encourages spending and investment, ideally boosting economic growth. Impact on Inflation: While rate cuts can stimulate growth, they can also contribute to inflation if not managed carefully. The Fed must balance these competing forces. Market Sentiment: Rate cuts are often seen as positive for risk assets like stocks and cryptocurrencies. Lower borrowing costs can increase liquidity and investor appetite for higher-yield investments. In essence, when the Federal Reserve cuts rates, it’s like injecting adrenaline into the financial system. But as with any stimulant, the dosage and timing are crucial. Mary Daly’s Perspective: Inflation Still in Focus Mary Daly, a key voice at the San Francisco Federal Reserve , has reiterated that her primary concern remains inflation . Despite ongoing debates and economic data fluctuations, she stated, “100% of my focus is on what’s happening with inflation .” This laser focus on inflation is critical because it dictates the Fed’s monetary policy decisions. Here’s what we can glean from Daly’s recent comments: Two Rate Cuts Still Possible: Despite some speculation of fewer cuts or even further rate hikes, Daly’s statement suggests that two interest rate cuts in 2025 remain a reasonable expectation, in her view. Data Dependent Approach: While leaning towards two cuts, Daly emphasizes that decisions will be data-dependent. Future inflation reports and economic indicators will heavily influence the Fed’s actions. Balancing Act: The Fed is walking a tightrope, aiming to curb inflation without triggering a recession. Interest rate cuts are a tool to navigate this delicate balance. Daly’s stance provides a degree of clarity amidst economic uncertainty, signaling that the possibility of easing monetary policy is still alive. How Do Interest Rate Cuts Impact the Crypto Market? The cryptocurrency market, known for its volatility and sensitivity to global financial trends, often reacts strongly to signals from central banks. Interest rate cuts can have several positive implications for the crypto market : Impact Description Increased Liquidity Lower interest rates can lead to increased liquidity in the financial system. Some of this liquidity can flow into higher-risk, higher-reward assets like cryptocurrencies. Weakening Dollar Rate cuts can sometimes weaken the US dollar. As Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are often priced against the dollar, a weaker dollar can make them relatively more attractive. Risk-On Sentiment Lower rates can foster a “risk-on” sentiment in the market. Investors may become more willing to take risks and allocate capital to assets like cryptocurrencies, seeking higher returns in a low-yield environment. Inflation Hedge Narrative In an environment where rate cuts might fuel inflation (even if moderately), the narrative of Bitcoin and some other cryptos as an inflation hedge could gain traction, attracting more investors. However, it’s crucial to remember that the crypto market is also influenced by a multitude of factors beyond macroeconomic policies. Regulatory developments, technological advancements, and market sentiment all play significant roles. Navigating the Economic Outlook: What’s Next? Daly’s comments offer a glimpse into the economic outlook and the Fed’s potential path forward. But what should crypto investors be watching for? Inflation Data: Keep a close eye on upcoming inflation reports (CPI, PCE). These will be key indicators for the Fed’s future decisions. Federal Reserve Meetings: Pay attention to the announcements and statements following Federal Reserve meetings. These provide direct insights into the central bank’s thinking. Broader Economic Indicators: Monitor GDP growth, employment figures, and other macroeconomic data that can influence the Federal Reserve policy. Crypto Market Reactions: Observe how the crypto market reacts to economic news and Fed announcements. Market sentiment can be a powerful force. The global economic outlook remains complex, and predicting the future with certainty is impossible. However, understanding the potential impact of interest rate cuts and closely monitoring key indicators can help crypto investors make more informed decisions. Conclusion: Hopeful Signs for Crypto on the Horizon? Mary Daly’s reiteration of the possibility of two interest rate cuts in 2025 injects a dose of hope into the financial markets, including the cryptocurrency sector. While the Federal Reserve’s primary focus remains taming inflation , the prospect of easing monetary policy could create a more favorable environment for risk assets. For crypto investors, this news warrants cautious optimism. Keep a watchful eye on economic data and Fed announcements, and prepare for potential shifts in market dynamics as the economic outlook unfolds. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.
tags: Crypto News|Crypto news|economic outlook|Federal Reserve|Inflation|interest rates

title: Thailand SEC Sues OKX: Unlicensed Crypto Exchange Operations
body: The post Thailand SEC Sues OKX: Unlicensed Crypto Exchange Operations appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Regulators worldwide are tightening their grip on crypto exchanges, and Thailand is no exception. The country’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has taken legal action against OKX , one of the biggest crypto exchanges, for allegedly operating without a license. The Thai SEC has filed a criminal complaint against Aux Cayes FinTech Co. Ltd., the operator of OKX, along with nine individuals linked to the platform. According to the regulator, OKX was offering crypto trading services in Thailand as far back as 2021—without the necessary approval. Why is OKX in Trouble? Authorities claim that OKX was actively promoting its services in Thailand via social media, including Telegram, X, and Line OpenChat. It even charges a 0.1% trading fee, just like licensed platforms. This, according to the SEC, violates Thailand’s Emergency Decree on Digital Asset Businesses, a law that ensures only regulated firms operate in the crypto space. The nine individuals accused in the case allegedly helped OKX to leverage the Thai market by promoting it to investors. The SEC argues that their insider trading and involvement are directly connected to the exchange’s illegal operations. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : FDIC Clears the Way for Banks to Engage in Crypto Activities, No Prior Approval Required! , What Happens Next? The case has been handed over to the Economic Crime Suppression Division (ECD), which will determine further legal action. If found guilty, OKX and those involved could face hefty penalties under Thai law. Meanwhile, the SEC is warning investors about the risks of using unlicensed platforms. Without proper regulation, there’s no guarantee of security, and investors could be exposed to fraud or financial losses. The regulator advises traders to check a platform’s licensing status before investing. This case highlights the increasing pressure on crypto exchanges to comply with local regulations. With more governments cracking down, exchanges operating without proper authorization could face serious consequences. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! title: Trending DeFi Platform Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Sells Out 3rd Presale Stage, Raise Hits $5,600,000
body: In a strong indication of that commitment, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has made waves through the finalization of its third presale round at $5.6 million. Since presale was announced, over 7,400 holders have already purchased tokens, demonstrating skyrocketing confidence in the platform’s decentralized lending infrastructure. Now at stage 4, with a price of $0.025 per token, the project shows no signs of slowing down. As such, investors are scrambling to get in ahead of stage 2’s 20% price-bump to $0.03, with analysts already pointing out a clear route to a 140% gain at $0.06 when it hits the exchanges. More conservative estimates predict MUTM to reach as high as $3.50 by the end of 2025, meaning those who buy the Tokens right at launch could find themselves in a unique position for exponential returns. The Presale Surge Happens Extremely Quickly Demand for Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is increasing and now Phase 4 is racing to the sell-out. The proprietary presale model of the platform, which raises prices in a systematic manner in 11 phases, has spurred buying from investors who want to enter at lower levels. Anyone buying in at $0.025 will realize an immediate gain upon the activation of the price tag at $0.03 in Phase 5 — a 20% jump. Not only do the early adopters reap the rewards, this tiered model provides a built in sustainability model for continued growth after launch. Having collectively raised $5.6 million and swollen participation numbers, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) — a new DeFi protocol integrated into the surge of decentralized finance based on Ethereum — is showing strong fundamentals against the backdrop of a volatile DeFi field. How Tokenomics Are Driving Predictions of a 14,000% Explosion With pragmatic utility and aggressive tokenomics to encourage holding, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a real opportunity. The $0.06 listing price represents a 140% profit for Phase 4 investors; more optimistic projections suggest something much bigger, however. The platform’s integration of revenue from its lending protocols to reinforce token buybacks and distribution to stakers guarantees a constant buy pressure. Combined with the real-life implementations such as overcollaterized loan and peer-to-peer lending that experts are indicating will be able to help MUTM rise as high as $3.50 just months after launch (14,000% from where it is right now). This growth would be greater than that of many established altcoins, bolstering Mutuum Finance (MUTM) more as a high-yield play rather than a speculative gamble. New Innovations Driving Institutional Interest The key attraction behind Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is its mtTokens system, a feature that transforms user deposits into interest-bearing assets. For instance, staking ETH produces mtETH over time, which gains value while remaining liquid. Coupling this model with flexible interest rates and collateralized stablecoin plans, bridges the flexibility of DeFi with the stability of traditional finance. An additional $100,000 giveaway for presale participants has driven further engagement, but it’s the project’s intrinsic mechanics — and not promotional tactics — that are attracting serious investor interest. Security Improvements Almost Done Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is moving ahead with its developers working on finalizing a smart contract audit fronted by Certik, a leading blockchain security firm. This assessment, likely to wrap up in weeks, will confirm the stability of the platform ahead of its exchange launch. Open and transparent about these efforts, the team emphasizes a focus on trust, which is vital as the project scales. Mutuum — More Than a Move with DeFi Trends. With Phase 4 filling fast and a $3.50 price target generating momentum, the opportunity to buy tokens at presale prices is closing. In a market that is hungry for innovation, investors are flocking to the asymmetric returns that MUTM’s blend of utility, incentives and strategy promises. Act Before Phase 4 Closes The current price of $0.025 is the last opportunity to prepare for large-scale milestones. As Phase 5 nears, costs to enter increase, but also the trajectory of the project. Follow Mutuum Finance’s official channels for news about the audit and presale developments—and why not join the 7,400 holders before the next price explosion? title: Urgent Stablecoin Scrutiny: Senators Question Trump Family’s Crypto Venture
body: The crypto world is buzzing with a new point of contention as World Liberty Financial (WLFI), a firm linked to the Trump family, steps into the stablecoin arena with its project, USD1. However, this venture has swiftly landed under the regulatory scrutiny of U.S. lawmakers. Five Democratic Senators have voiced serious concerns about potential conflict of interest , igniting a debate about the intersection of politics, family ties, and the burgeoning digital currency landscape. Are these concerns valid, and what does this mean for the future of stablecoin regulation ? Let’s dive deep into this developing story. Why are Senators Raising Alarms About USD1 Stablecoin? The core of the issue revolves around the perceived conflict of interest . With WLFI being led by President Donald Trump’s family, alarm bells are ringing in Washington D.C. Senators are questioning the impartiality of financial regulators when dealing with a project so closely connected to a prominent political figure, especially amidst ongoing discussions about stablecoin legislation. Here’s a breakdown of the key concerns: Political Influence: The senators’ letter directly addresses concerns about diminished independence of financial regulators, implying a worry that political connections might unduly influence the oversight of USD1. Regulatory Gaps: At a time when Congress is actively debating and formulating laws around stablecoins, this project throws a spotlight on existing regulatory ambiguities and potential loopholes. Financial System Risks: The senators emphasize the potential risks to the broader financial system if stablecoins are not properly regulated, and they want to ensure that projects like USD1 are held to the highest standards. Transparency and Oversight: The lawmakers are seeking clarity on how agencies like the Federal Reserve and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) plan to oversee USD1, demanding transparency in the process. Decoding the Senators’ Letter: What Questions are Being Asked? The letter sent by the senators to Michelle Bowman and Rodney Hood is a formal request for information and assurances. It’s not just a casual inquiry; it’s a structured demand for accountability. Here are some pivotal questions they are likely posing: What specific regulatory framework will be applied to USD1? Senators want to know if USD1 will be subject to the same rigorous standards as other financial products, or if there will be any exceptions or special considerations. How will potential conflicts of interest be managed, given the Trump family’s involvement? This is a central point. The regulators need to demonstrate a clear plan to ensure unbiased oversight, free from any political influence. What measures will be in place to protect consumers and the financial system from potential risks associated with USD1? This speaks to the core purpose of regulation – safeguarding the public and the economy. What is the timeline for regulatory review and approval of USD1? Transparency about the process and expected timelines is crucial for public trust and market confidence. How will the agencies coordinate to ensure comprehensive and consistent oversight of stablecoin projects like USD1? Given the overlapping jurisdictions of different regulatory bodies, coordination is essential to avoid gaps or inconsistencies. The Broader Landscape: Stablecoins and Crypto Oversight This situation with USD1 is unfolding against a backdrop of increasing global attention towards stablecoin regulation and crypto oversight . Stablecoins, designed to maintain a stable value, often pegged to fiat currencies like the US dollar, have become critical components of the crypto ecosystem. However, their rapid growth and systemic importance have caught the attention of regulators worldwide. Here’s why crypto oversight of stablecoins is paramount: Systemic Risk: Large-scale stablecoins could pose systemic risks to the financial system if not properly managed, especially in times of market stress. Consumer Protection: Users of stablecoins need protection against fraud, market manipulation, and operational failures. Regulatory frameworks are needed to ensure fair and transparent operations. Monetary Policy Implications: The widespread adoption of stablecoins could have implications for monetary policy and the sovereignty of national currencies. Central banks are closely monitoring these developments. Financial Stability: Regulators aim to maintain financial stability and prevent the use of stablecoins for illicit activities like money laundering and terrorist financing. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for the Crypto Community? The senators’ move highlights several key takeaways for the cryptocurrency community and investors: Insight Implication Increased Regulatory Focus Expect more intense scrutiny and potentially stricter regulations for stablecoins globally. Projects must prioritize compliance and transparency. Political Sensitivities Cryptocurrency projects with political connections will face heightened scrutiny. Reputation and perceived neutrality will be increasingly important. Importance of Compliance For stablecoin projects to succeed long-term, robust compliance frameworks and proactive engagement with regulators are no longer optional but essential. Market Volatility Potential Regulatory uncertainty can introduce short-term market volatility. However, clear and sensible regulations can ultimately foster long-term stability and growth. Looking Ahead: The Future of USD1 and Stablecoin Regulation The coming weeks and months will be crucial for USD1 and the broader stablecoin regulation landscape. The responses from the Federal Reserve and the OCC to the senators’ letter will be closely watched. This situation could set a precedent for how regulators approach crypto projects with political links and how stablecoins are governed moving forward. It’s a pivotal moment that underscores the growing pains of a rapidly evolving industry seeking to find its place within established financial and political systems. In conclusion, the senators’ concerns about WLFI’s USD1 stablecoin are a stark reminder of the complexities and challenges facing the crypto world as it matures. The demand for crypto oversight is intensifying, and projects must navigate a landscape where regulatory compliance and public trust are paramount. The unfolding story of USD1 will undoubtedly offer valuable lessons for the future of digital currencies and their integration into the global financial system. To learn more about the latest stablecoin regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping stablecoin policy .

title: Shocking AI Takeover: Elon Musk’s xAI Acquires X in Massive $80 Billion Deal
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts and tech aficionados! In a move that has sent shockwaves across Silicon Valley and beyond, Elon Musk has just announced a groundbreaking development. His artificial intelligence startup, xAI, has acquired the social media giant X, formerly known as Twitter. Yes, you read that right – the platform that has become synonymous with real-time updates, memes, and crypto discussions is now under the wing of Musk’s ambitious AI venture. Let’s dive into this jaw-dropping AI takeover and what it means for the future of both AI and social media. Elon Musk’s xAI Acquisition of X: A Done Deal? According to Musk’s post on X itself, this isn’t just a merger; it’s an outright Elon Musk xAI Acquisition . He stated that the transaction is an all-stock deal, valuing xAI at a staggering $80 billion and X at $33 billion (after accounting for $12 billion in debt). This bold move signals a deep integration of AI into the fabric of social networking. But is this really happening? The initial announcement is causing a stir, and while details are still emerging, the implications are massive. Key Highlights of the Acquisition: All-Stock Transaction: The deal is structured as an all-stock transaction, indicating a strong belief in the combined entity’s future potential. Valuation: xAI is valued at $80 billion, while X is valued at $33 billion ($45B – $12B debt). Strategic Integration: Musk emphasized the intertwining futures of xAI and X, aiming to combine data, models, compute power, distribution, and talent. Why is this a Big Deal for the Tech Industry News? This Tech Industry News is not just another acquisition; it’s a potential paradigm shift. Consider these points: Data Synergies: X is a goldmine of real-time data. Combined with xAI’s advanced AI models, this could lead to unprecedented advancements in AI capabilities, especially in natural language processing and real-time analysis. Distribution Power: X’s massive user base provides xAI with an unparalleled distribution channel to deploy and test its AI technologies directly with millions of users. Imagine AI-powered features seamlessly integrated into your daily social media experience. Musk’s Vision: This move aligns perfectly with Elon Musk’s broader vision of integrating AI into every aspect of technology and potentially human life. He’s not just building AI in a lab; he’s embedding it into a core communication platform. What Does This Mean for X (formerly Twitter) Users? For the millions who use X formerly Twitter daily, this acquisition could mean a significant evolution of the platform. Think about: Potential Benefits Possible Challenges Enhanced Content Curation: AI could revolutionize content discovery, ensuring users see the most relevant and engaging information. Improved User Experience: Expect smarter recommendations, better spam and bot detection, and potentially AI-powered content creation tools. New Features: Integration of xAI’s technology could lead to entirely new, AI-driven features we haven’t even imagined yet. Privacy Concerns: Deeper AI integration might raise questions about data privacy and how user information is utilized by the combined entity. Algorithmic Bias: AI algorithms can sometimes exhibit biases. Ensuring fairness and transparency in AI-driven features will be crucial. Platform Changes: Significant shifts in platform functionality might require users to adapt to new ways of interacting with X. Social Media Platform Merger: A New Era? This Social Media Platform Merger isn’t just about two entities joining forces; it’s about the convergence of social media and artificial intelligence at a scale never seen before. Could this be the blueprint for the future of social networking? Will other platforms follow suit, seeking to embed AI deeply into their operations? The industry is watching closely. Key Questions Arising from the Merger: Regulatory Scrutiny: Such a large acquisition in the tech space is likely to attract regulatory attention. Will antitrust concerns be raised? Integration Timeline: How quickly and seamlessly will xAI’s technologies be integrated into X? What will be the user-facing changes in the short and long term? Competitive Landscape: How will competitors like Meta, Google, and others respond to this bold move? Will we see a new wave of AI-driven innovation in social media? The Future is Now: Navigating the AI-Social Media Revolution Elon Musk’s acquisition of X by xAI is more than just a business deal; it’s a declaration of intent. It signals a future where AI is not just a tool but an integral part of our digital interactions and social platforms. As this story develops, the cryptocurrency and tech communities are keenly observing how this Elon Musk xAI Acquisition will reshape the landscape. Stay tuned for more updates as we unpack the implications of this groundbreaking merger. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: BitMEX Founder Arthur Hayes Says “Tariffs Cannot Stop Bitcoin”, Shares New BTC Price Expectations
body: As the U.S. prepares for a new wave of tariffs set to go into effect on April 2, financial markets are reacting with uncertainty. President Donald Trump’s tariff policies targeting Canadian and Mexican goods, Chinese cars and more have caused volatility, but Arthur Hayes, chief investment officer at Maelstrom and co-founder of BitMEX, believes these measures will have little impact on Bitcoin’s trajectory. During a podcast with Kyle Chasse, Hayes noted that Fed Chairman Jerome Powell’s recent stance on monetary policy outweighs the importance of tariffs. Quoting Powell, Hayes said, “The inflationary aspects of tariffs are temporary,” signaling that the Fed is ready to inject more liquidity into the system. Related News: BREAKING: Coinbase Lists Two New Altcoins in Futures According to Hayes, this monetary easing could provide a favorable environment for Bitcoin and other risky assets. “Tariffs are no longer important to Powell and they shouldn’t be important to crypto investors,” he said, adding: “Whether Trump imposes 50% tariffs or just 2%, it doesn’t matter because we know Powell will continue to maintain easy monetary conditions to keep assets appreciating.” Hayes suggested that even if Trump’s tariffs lead to inflationary pressures, Powell would likely ignore the concerns and continue to support accommodative policies, potentially opening the door for further quantitative easing, an outcome that has historically benefited Bitcoin. Earlier this week, Hayes revised his Bitcoin price prediction and now predicts a rally to $110,000. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: BitMEX Founder Arthur Hayes Says “Tariffs Cannot Stop Bitcoin”, Shares New BTC Price Expectations

title: Pi Network Price Eyes 40% Rally Amid Stellar Partnership For Pi Coin Stablecoin
body: Pi Network price could be on the verge of a parabolic rally after Pi Coin partnered with the Stellar network to conduct tests for a stablecoin. This partnership might aid a Pi Coin price recovery after the altcoin recorded one of its worst trading weeks since launch after plunging by 17%. Pi Network Partners with Stellar for Pi Coin Stablecoin Several reports suggest that the Pi Network development team could be working on launching a stablecoin in partnership with the Stellar blockchain, which seeks to enable cost-effective money transfers. The Pi Network community identified a smart contract code that suggested that such a partnership deal would happen soon. At the same time, another report indicated that a Pi Coin stablecoin was being tested on the Stellar mainnet environment. Pi Coin Stablecoin Earlier this month, Coingape reported that Pi Network was working on a price pegging mechanism . This mechanism is used with stablecoins such as USDT and USDC and would bolster Pi Coin’s use as a means of payment. The reports of a Pi Coin stablecoin testing on Stellar come after Pi Network was integrated into the Telegram network . Some community members noted that the integration was a “historic step toward mass adoption of decentralized finance.” These developments suggest that Pi Coin is acquiring some strong fundamentals, which can aid a price recovery. Can Pi Network Price Rally 40%? Pi Network price trades at $0.824 today after a 2.6% decline in 24 hours. This altcoin has been under bearish pressure due to the falling Bitcoin price and a pullback across the broader crypto market. Moreover, the lack of a major exchange listing has added to the headwinds facing Pi Coin. Nevertheless, the 4-hour price chart indicates that a massive rally is looming. This is after Pi Coin confirmed a breakout from a falling broadening wedge pattern. If this breakout is strong and attracts buying pressure, it could reverse the current trend from bearish to bullish. A decisive breakout will lead to Pi Network price rising by more than 44% from the current price. In this case, Pi Coin will rise towards $1.19. The volume histogram bars have turned to green, which highlights a slight uptick in buying activity, which shows some traders bought the dip. However, the RSI is still below 40, which is a sign that sellers have the upper hand, leading to a bullish Pi network price prediction . At the same time, the Average Directional Index (ADX) indicator has tipped south, another signal that the current trend is weak. This may prevent a decisive breakout from the falling wedge. PI/USDT: 4-hour Chart A recovery for Pi Network price to $3 ATH could be aided by news of strategic partnerships and ecosystem growth. However, if buyers continue to show hesitance, it could cause a dip towards the $1 price level. The post Pi Network Price Eyes 40% Rally Amid Stellar Partnership For Pi Coin Stablecoin appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Transformative Shift: Galaxy Digital’s Bold Pivot from Bitcoin Mining to AI Dominance with CoreWeave
body: In a transformative move that signals a significant shift in strategy within the cryptocurrency landscape, Galaxy Digital, a prominent crypto financial services firm, is dialing down its Bitcoin mining operations to aggressively ramp up its presence in the burgeoning field of Artificial Intelligence (AI). This strategic pivot is cemented by a groundbreaking 15-year hosting agreement with cloud-computing powerhouse CoreWeave, turning Galaxy’s Texas-based data center into a hub for AI and high-performance computing (HPC). Why Galaxy Digital is Making a Bold Bitcoin Mining to AI Pivot? For those deeply entrenched in the crypto world, the name Galaxy Digital is synonymous with digital asset innovation and investment. However, recent reports from TheMinerMag reveal a calculated recalibration of their business model. The core of this shift? A strategic move away from heavy reliance on Bitcoin mining and a decisive leap into the high-demand arena of AI infrastructure support. This isn’t just a minor adjustment; it’s a fundamental realignment of resources and focus, driven by the evolving demands of the tech world and the potential seen in AI. Here’s a breakdown of what’s unfolding: Data Center Repurposing: Galaxy Digital is transforming its Texas data center, initially designed for Bitcoin mining, into a state-of-the-art facility catering to AI and HPC. CoreWeave Partnership: A long-term 15-year hosting deal with CoreWeave ensures Galaxy will play a crucial role in supporting the infrastructure needs of a leading cloud-computing firm specializing in compute-intensive workloads like AI. Reduced Bitcoin Hashrate: As resources are redirected, Galaxy anticipates a decrease in its Bitcoin hashrate and, consequently, lower Bitcoin production in the coming quarters. Financial Performance: Galaxy Digital’s Q4 2024 earnings report, released on March 28th, highlighted their Bitcoin mining activities, showing 977 BTC mined in 2024, generating $22.1 million in revenue. This context underscores the scale of the operational shift as they move away from this revenue stream. Understanding the CoreWeave AI Partnership and its Significance The collaboration with CoreWeave is the linchpin of Galaxy Digital’s AI strategy. CoreWeave isn’t just any cloud provider; they are known for their specialized infrastructure tailored for demanding computational tasks, especially in AI and machine learning. By partnering with CoreWeave, Galaxy Digital is positioning itself at the forefront of supporting the AI revolution. This move taps into a market that is experiencing exponential growth, driven by the increasing demand for AI across various industries. Key aspects of the CoreWeave partnership include: Aspect Details Duration 15-year hosting deal, providing long-term stability and revenue stream. Facility Repurposed Texas data center, optimized for AI and HPC requirements. CoreWeave’s Expertise Leverages CoreWeave’s specialization in cloud computing for AI, machine learning, and other intensive applications. Strategic Alignment Aligns Galaxy Digital with the high-growth AI sector, diversifying beyond crypto mining. Impact on Crypto Data Centers and the Future Landscape Galaxy Digital’s decision reflects a broader trend where infrastructure originally built for crypto mining is being re-evaluated for alternative, potentially more lucrative applications. Data centers, especially those with robust power and cooling capabilities essential for mining, are highly adaptable for AI workloads. This pivot highlights the versatility of such facilities and the evolving nature of the digital infrastructure landscape. What does this mean for the crypto data center industry? Diversification: Crypto data centers are exploring diversification opportunities beyond mining, with AI and HPC emerging as attractive alternatives. Optimized Resource Utilization: Facilities can optimize resource utilization by catering to both crypto and AI demands, or shifting focus entirely based on market dynamics. Revenue Stream Expansion: Moving into AI infrastructure hosting can open up new and potentially larger revenue streams compared to the fluctuating profitability of Bitcoin mining. Market Adaptation: The industry is showing signs of adapting to market changes and technological advancements by embracing new sectors like AI. Unveiling the Potential of AI Infrastructure Hosting The move towards AI infrastructure hosting is not just opportunistic; it’s strategic. The demand for computational power to drive AI applications is exploding. From training complex machine learning models to powering AI-driven services, the need for robust and scalable infrastructure is paramount. Galaxy Digital, through its partnership with CoreWeave, is positioning itself to capitalize on this surging demand. Benefits of focusing on AI infrastructure hosting: High Growth Market: The AI market is experiencing rapid expansion, offering significant growth potential for infrastructure providers. Stable Demand: Unlike the volatility of crypto markets, the demand for AI compute power is expected to be more stable and continuously increasing. Higher Margins: AI infrastructure services can potentially command higher margins compared to Bitcoin mining, depending on operational efficiencies and market conditions. Long-Term Contracts: The 15-year deal with CoreWeave exemplifies the potential for long-term, predictable revenue streams in AI hosting. Is This the End of Galaxy Digital’s Bitcoin Mining Era? While Galaxy Digital is significantly scaling back its Bitcoin mining operations, it’s crucial to note that they are not entirely abandoning the sector. The company’s Q4 report still reflects substantial Bitcoin mining revenue. However, the emphasis is clearly shifting. The partnership with CoreWeave and the repurposing of the Texas data center indicate a strategic prioritization of AI infrastructure. It’s more accurate to say Galaxy Digital is evolving its Bitcoin mining strategy rather than completely exiting the space. They are adapting to seize opportunities in the rapidly growing AI domain, recognizing its potential for sustained growth and profitability. Conclusion: A Strategic Leap into the Future Galaxy Digital’s pivot from Bitcoin mining to AI infrastructure represents a bold and forward-thinking strategic decision. By partnering with CoreWeave and transforming its data center, Galaxy is not just reacting to market trends but proactively shaping its future in the digital economy. This move underscores the dynamic nature of the tech industry and the importance of adaptability. As the lines between crypto and AI blur, companies like Galaxy Digital are leading the charge in exploring new synergies and opportunities at the intersection of these groundbreaking technologies. This strategic realignment could very well set a new precedent for how digital infrastructure companies navigate the evolving tech landscape. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping crypto market trends.

title: Why Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Are Down Today? On-Chain Data Reveals the Truth
body: The post Why Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Are Down Today? On-Chain Data Reveals the Truth appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News After failing to regain a bullish outlook on Friday during the Western financial markets, the crypto market continued to record bearish sentiment on Saturday during the early Asian trading session. The total crypto market cap dropped nearly 5 percent in the past 24 hours to hover about $2.813 trillion at the time of this writing. Bitcoin (BTC) price dropped around 3 percent in the past 24 hours to trade about $83,719 on Saturday, during the early London session. Ethereum (ETH) price dropped over 2.3 percent in the past 24 hours to trade at about $1,878 at the time of this writing. Meanwhile, XRP price shed over 5 percent in the last 24 hours to trade at about $2.14. Top Reasons Why the Wider Altcoin Market Followed Bitcoin in Correction According to on-chain data analysis, the demand for crypto assets has significantly declined in the last few days. For instance, Bitcoin demand remains in contraction mode, even at a higher rate than what was experienced in December 2023. The overall cash inflow to altcoins led by Ethereum and XRP has significantly decreased in the recent past. The U.S. spot Ether ETFs are about to close March with the largest cash outflow since August 2024, of over $400 million. Meanwhile, on-chain data shows whale investors have increased their activity, possibly fleeing to the gold and stablecoins markets to protect capital. Whales have moved over 200,000 #Ethereum $ETH in the past two weeks! pic.twitter.com/J270zcRcGl — Ali (@ali_charts) March 29, 2025 .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : What’s Next for Crypto After Ripple, Coinbase Dismissals? Incoming SEC Chair Paul Atkins Speaks , What Next? The 2025 cryptocurrency bull market is at a crucial pivotal moment, which could either lead to a V-shaped recovery soon or further correction in the coming months. Ahead of the April 2 U.S. tariff implementation , the overall demand for crypto assets could remain low, causing further bearish sentiment. Don't shoot the messenger. Your favorite Beanie Baby/Pet Rock crypto displays a classic complex H&S top. This could become bullish if 3.0 is exceeded, otherwise the implications is a decline to 1.07. Lets dive deep into three red-hot contenders: Arctic Pablo Coin , Zignaly, and the seasoned vet Chainlink. Arctic Pablo Coin – The Best Crypto Presale To Buy With Mythical Meme Upside Let’s kick things off with the Best Crypto Presale to Buy for 2025: Arctic Pablo Coin ($APC). This ain’t your average meme coin—it’s a story, a world, and a movement. Picture this: an arctic explorer on a snowmobile named Pablo, racing across frostbitten realms, discovering mystical $APC coins hidden in icy coves. Each presale location (not stage) unlocks a new piece of the narrative, and right now, Location 16: Crystal Cove, with tokens priced at just $0.000083.
